result.ga: agus ar scor ar bith nach cuma
result.orig: agus ar scor ar bith nach cuma
result.html: agus ar scor ar bith nach cumaAnd anyway, does it matter?
result.ponchtml: agus ar scor ar biṫ naċ cumaAnd anyway, does it matter?

result.eng: Do you have any opinion on the matter?
result.ga: an bhfuil aon tuairim agat ar an ábhar
result.orig: an bhfuil aon tuairim agat ar an ábhar
result.html: an bhfuil aon tuairim agat ar an ábharDo you have any opinion on the matter?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil aon tuairim agat ar an áḃarDo you have any opinion on the matter?

result.eng: I would like to say something on this matter.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.orig: ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seo
result.html: ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ar an ábhar seoI would like to say something on this matter.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ar an áḃar seoI would like to say something on this matter.

result.eng: She asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ga: chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.orig: chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairt
result.html: chuir sí an cheist i gcomhairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sí an ċeist i gcoṁairle an tsagairtShe asked the priest's advice on the matter.

result.eng: No matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ga: dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.orig: dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadh
result.html: dá fhad an oíche tiocfaidh an mhaidin ar deireadhNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.
result.ponchtml: dá ḟad an oíċe tiocfaiḋ an ṁaidin ar deireaḋNo matter how long the night, the morning will come at the end.

result.eng: No matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ga: dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.orig: dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.html: dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ponchtml: dá ṁéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: It doesn't bloody matter where he is!
result.ga: is cuma sa diabhal cá bhfuil sé
result.orig: is cuma sa diabhal cá bhfuil sé
result.html: is cuma sa diabhal cá bhfuil séIt doesn't bloody matter where he is!
result.ponchtml: is cuma sa diaḃal cá ḃfuil séIt doesn't bloody matter where he is!

result.eng: The matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ga: pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.orig: pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairle
result.html: pléadh an cheist ag cruinniú na comhairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.
result.ponchtml: pléaḋ an ċeist ag cruinniú na coṁairleThe matter was discussed at a meeting of the council.

result.ga: tá an scéal seo ag éirí conspóideach
result.orig: tá an scéal seo ag éirí conspóideach
result.html: tá an scéal seo ag éirí conspóideachThis matter is becoming controversial.
result.ponchtml: tá an scéal seo ag éirí conspóideaċThis matter is becoming controversial.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
